nodes.text: Mobquet Swoops and Speeders was a company owned by parent company TaggeCo. They built swoops, landspeeders and airspeeders, as their name might suggest. A popular landspeeder model they produced was the A-1 Deluxe Floater. They also produced the Flare-P swoop, the more advanced Flare-S swoop and the powerful Nebulon-Q thruster jet. These speeders' success in the Core swoop-racing leagues enhanced the company's reputation. Mobquet also was the sponsor of the Mobquet Presents: Fastest Land Beings races on Teyr.
Mobquet also produced the MB-C1 medium transport owned by the smugglers Salla Zend and Shug Ninx called the Starlight Intruder.
